title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 13.1 - Regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 13.1 - Regulations

State Regulations

The commissioner shall establish regulations governing the
following: (a) the registration of
courses of study in colleges, professional, technical and other
schools; (b) the requirements for
qualifying certificates; (c) the
approval of correspondence schools; (d) professional licensing, certification and
practice; (e) the registration of
private business schools; and
(f) the registration of public and nonpublic high schools and public elementary
schools, intermediate schools, middle schools, and junior high
schools. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
13.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
